pkgmetadata.longdescription: Block Structure Detection Using Singular Vectors // Performs block diagonal covariance matrix detection using singular vectors (BD-SVD), which can be extended to hierarchical variable clustering (HC-SVD). The methods are described in Bauer (2024) doi:10.1080/10618600.2024.2422985 and Bauer (202X) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2308.06820.
